node.title: Man seriously injured in Christchurch after fleeing driver collides into him
node.description: The incident happened just after midnight on Saturday.
node.content: ["A man has received serious injuries after a person fleeing from police collided with his car in Christchurch on Saturday morning.\u00a0", "Police said in a statement to Newshub the incident happened just after midnight on Saturday when officers attempted to stop a vehicle.\u00a0", "The person driving the vehicle then fled and officers decided to pursue him. The fleeing driver then collided with another vehicle at the intersection on Main North and Radcliffe Rds.", "According to police, the driver of the second car received serious injuries.\u00a0", "\"The driver of the car which had earlier refused to stop fled the scene on foot, but was located with the assistance of a police dog unit,\" a spokesperson said.", "He was also injured and taken to hospital by police.", "An investigation into the incident is ongoing."]
